traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Bastian's innate spellcasting ability is Constitution (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells: * At will: produce flame * 1/day: burning hands

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: Bastian is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Bastian knows the following sorcerer spells: * Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, message, prestidigitation, shocking grasp * 1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield * 2nd level (3 slots): misty step, scorching ray * 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball * 4th level (3 slots): dimension door, wall of fire * 5th level (1 slot): hold monster

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
